From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Actually, I'm more in favor of a group of us work collectively in this 
forum to create 50 brand new scenarios, aka 'The 50 Project'.  This 
would be better than individual efforts because with more people 
involved would keep get the scenarios completed faster.  I'd like 50 
brand-new, start from stratch scenarios so that I can have something I 
can send a large team (more than 4 members) through every scenario.
